  <description>
    <facet>
      <vocabularyID>LRE.expressionDescriptionFacetValues</vocabularyID>
      <value>main</value>
    </facet>
    <metadata>
      <schema>http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM</schema>
      <lom xsi:schemaLocation="http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/lomv1.0/lomLoose.xsd" xmlns="http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM">
        <general>
          <identifier>
            <catalog>oai</catalog>
            <entry>oai:merli.xtec.cat:merli/3249</entry>
          </identifier>
          <identifier>
            <catalog>MERLI</catalog>
            <entry>merli/3249</entry>
          </identifier>
          <title>
            <string language="ca">El món per un forat</string>
            <string language="en">"The world through a keyhole"</string>
            <string language="x-mt-de">"die Welt durch ein Schlüsselloch"</string>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">"le monde par un trou de la serrure"</string>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">"o mundo através de um buraco da fechadura"</string>
            <string language="x-mt-it">"il mondo attraverso un buco della serratura"</string>
            <string language="x-mt-el">"Ο κόσμος μέσω μιας κλειδαρότρυπασ"</string>
          </title>
          <language>ca</language>
          <description>
            <string language="ca">Sèrie de vídeos, fotografies, dibuixos i activitats interactives amb temàtiques sobre els éssers vius (animals, plantes), 
els paisatges (entorns naturals) i la societat (festes populars, mercats...).</string>
            <string language="en">A series of videos, photos, pictures and interactive exercises on living beings (animals and plants), landscape (natural environments) and society (festivals, markets, etc.)</string>
          </description>
          <keyword>
            <string language="ca">animal</string>
            <string language="en">animal</string>
            <string language="es">animal</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="ca">paisatge</string>
            <string language="en">landscape</string>
            <string language="es">paisaje</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="ca">ciències de la naturalesa</string>
            <string language="en">natural sciences</string>
            <string language="es">ciencias de la naturaleza</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="ca">ciències socials</string>
            <string language="en">social sciences</string>
            <string language="es">ciencias sociales</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="ca">societat</string>
            <string language="en">society</string>
            <string language="es">sociedad</string>
          </keyword>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Eine Reihe videos, Fotos, Abbildungen und 
interaktive Übungen auf lebenden Wesen (Tiere und Betriebe), 
Landschaft (natürliche Umgebungen) und Gesellschaft (Festivals, 
Märkte, usw..)</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">Une série de videos, photos, images et exercices 
interactifs sur les êtres vivants (animaux et usines), horizontal 
(environnements normaux) et société (festivals, marchés, etc...)</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Uma série dos videos, as fotos, os retratos e 
exercícios interativos em seres vivos (animais e plantas), paisagem 
(ambientes naturais) e sociedade (festivals, mercados, etc..)</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Una serie di videos, foto, immagini ed 
esercitazioni interattive sugli esseri viventi (animali e piante), 
paesaggio (ambienti naturali) e società (festival, mercati, ecc.)</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Μια σειρά βίντεο, φωτογραφιών, εικόνων και διαλογικών
ασκήσεων στα ζωντανά οντα (ζώα και φυτά), τοπίου (φυσικά 
περιβάλλοντα) και κοινωνίας (φεστιβάλ, αγορές, κ.λπ....)</string>
          </description>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Tier</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Landschaft</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-de">natürliche Wissenschaften</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Sozialwissenschaften</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Gesellschaft</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">animal</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">horizontal</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">les sciences normales</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">les sciences sociales</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">société</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">animal</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">paisagem</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">ciências naturais</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">ciências sociais</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">sociedade</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-it">animale</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-it">paesaggio</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-it">scienze naturali</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-it">scienze sociali</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-it">società</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-el">ζώο</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>

          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-el">κοινωνία</string>
          </keyword>
